Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Firmly \Firm"ly\, adv. In a firm manner. [1913 Webster]

firmly adv 1: with resolute determination; "we firmly believed it"; "you must stand firm" [syn: {firm}, {steadfastly}, {unwaveringly}] 2: in a secure manner; in a manner free from danger; "she held the child securely" [syn: {securely}] 3: with firmness; "held hard to the railing" [syn: {hard}]
